Package com.sixdimensions.wcm.cq.component.bindings

Component Bindings Provider API - allows developers to bind value providers to resource types.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ComponentBindingsProvider
    A component bindings provider for every script load (including scripts in languages besides JSP).
    ComponentBindingsProviderFactory
    A factory for retrieving component bindings provider.
    CQVariables
    Extends the Sling Bindings to make available all of the objects the <cq:defineObjects /> tag adds as well as the sling objects.
    CQVariablesService
    A service for retrieving CQ Variables.

Package com.sixdimensions.wcm.cq.component.bindings Description

Component Bindings Provider API - allows developers to bind value providers to resource types.
Since:
1.6
Author:
dklco
